statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_result FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
SELECT interaction_date, campaign_name FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Winter%';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_result = 'Successful' AND campaign_name LIKE '%Digital%';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_result = 'Failed' ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY campaign_name;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone='123-456-7890';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='click' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, m.campaign_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns m ON c.customer_id = m.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Click' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_start_date;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_description FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;

SELECT campaign_name, interaction_result FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_interactions ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_interactions.campaign_id WHERE interaction_result = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123456789';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT log_id, interaction_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM interactions_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions
SELECT interaction_date, customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC LIMIT 3
